model: select opportunity__table.*, (amount * probability) as opportunity_test_formula from salesforce_formula_integration_tests.opportunity as opportunity__table
select account__table.*, (number_of_employees * 2) as account_test_formula from salesforce_formula_integration_tests.account as account__table
select user__table.*, case when is_active = true then 'active' else 'not active' end as is_active_user from salesforce_formula_integration_tests.user as user__table
select user_role__table.*, concat(developer_name,id) as developer_and_id from salesforce_formula_integration_tests.user_role as user_role__table
